titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the John Sanilac III of Michigan : a brief narrative of the settlement and development of a typical agricultural region of Michigan, with an orderly description of the progress made during its century of ownership by three generations

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English
